title: Little vanilla cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '5 tablespoons self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon semi-skimmed dried milk', '4 tablespoons softened butter or margerine', '150g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 medium egg', '3 tablespoons milk', 'For the icing', '4 tablespoons icing suar', '1 teaspoon semi-skimmed dried milk', '1 1/2 tablespoons softened butter']
